messages.content:
URGENT: Search for "camping tents under 75 dollars" on Google Shopping as FAST as possible.

INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Take ONE screenshot
2. If search box visible: clear it, type "camping tents under 75 dollars", press Enter
3. If not on Google Shopping: go to shopping.google.com, then search
4. Wait 2 seconds for results
5. STOP - do not scroll or click anything else

BE FAST. NO EXTRA ACTIONS. NO SCROLLING. NO CLICKING PRODUCTS.
I'll help you search for camping tents under 75 dollars on Google Shopping as quickly as possible. Let me start by taking a screenshot to see the current state of the screen.

Perfect! I can see that Google Shopping is already open with a search box visible. The current search shows "find me the top tents under 100 dollars". I need to clear this and type the new search query. Let me click on the search box to clear it first.

Good, I've clicked on the search box and I can see a dropdown menu with suggestions. Now I need to clear the current text and type the new search query. I'll select all the text first and then type the new query.
Perfect! I can see the text in the search box is now selected (highlighted in blue). Now I'll type the new search query.

message.content: Great! I've typed "camping tents under 75 dollars" in the search box. Now I need to press Enter to search.
